name: AMERICAN INTERNATIONAL GROUP, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Monitor implementation of P.L. 115-97, the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

Educate Members on AIG and Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act; monitor H.R. 4061, the Financial Stability Oversight Council Improvement Act of 2017.
